remarks:
Conjoin antecedents and consequents of two premises.  (Contributed by NM, 3-Jan-1993.)  (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 14-Dec-2013.)

 Conjoin antecedents and consequents of two premises.  (Contributed by NM, 5-Aug-1993.)  (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 14-Dec-2013.)
statement:
anim12i.1 $e |- ( ph -> ps ) $.
anim12i.2 $e |- ( ch -> th ) $.
anim12i $p |- ( ( ph /\ ch ) -> ( ps /\ th ) ) $.
